title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\SmartReplyMetrics\TopNMetrics
name: TopNMetrics
description:
Evaluation metrics when retrieving n smart replies with the model.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SmartReplyMetrics.TopNMetrics

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.n
params.description: Number of retrieved smart replies. For example, when n is 3, this evaluation contains metrics for when Dialogflow retrieves 3 smart replies with the model.

params.name: data.recall
params.description: Defined as number of queries whose top n smart replies have at least one similar (token match similarity above the defined threshold) reply as the real reply divided by number of queries with at least one smart reply. Value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 inclusive.

methods.name: getN
methods.description:
Number of retrieved smart replies. For example, when n is 3, this evaluation contains metrics for when Dialogflow retrieves 3 smart replies with the model.

Generated from protobuf field int32 n = 1;

params.name: var
params.description: Number of retrieved smart replies. For example, when n is 3, this evaluation contains metrics for when Dialogflow retrieves 3 smart replies with the model.

methods.name: getRecall
methods.description:
Defined as number of queries whose top n smart replies have at least one similar (token match similarity above the defined threshold) reply as the real reply divided by number of queries with at least one smart reply.

Value ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 inclusive.

Generated from protobuf field float recall = 2;
